mapper.select: SELECT id AS id ,user_id AS userId ,category_id AS categoryId ,title AS title ,content AS content ,image_urls AS imageUrls ,view_count AS viewCount ,created_at AS createdAt FROM communities WHERE id = #{id}

SELECT id AS id ,user_id AS userId ,category_id AS categoryId ,title AS title ,content AS content ,image_urls AS imageUrls ,view_count AS viewCount ,created_at AS createdAt FROM communities WHERE 1=1
AND title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{title}, '%')
AND deleted_at IS NULL ORDER BY created_at DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO communities (user_id, category_id, property_id, title, content, image_urls) VALUES (#{userId}, #{categoryId}, #{propertyId}, #{title}, #{content}, string_to_array(#{imageUrls}, ','))
